titleInfo.title: ‘Outline Plan and Sections of Shuwyee or Long Island in the harbour of Aden’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:589 x 1410 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Compiled and signed by a Special Committee on the Aden Defences formed of Engineers Lieutenant Colonel C.W. Grant and Major Artillery William Jacob, Bombay 23rd April 1844. Includes outline plan and corresponding longitudinal sections; lettered for reference with measurements reported.Labels:On verso, upper right:‘Duplicate ADEN OUTLINE PLAN and SECTIONS of SHUWYEE or Long Island in the harbour of Aden’. ‘No. 39’.
